entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add GetOrAddAsync/AddOrUpdateAsync to ConcurrentDictionary #83636
  • stackalloc is zeroed in prolog even if rarely-used #83629
    Future

Closed

  • Marshal.Copy throws SEHException on Arm64. #83626
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .NET 6 #83027
  • Deserializing references results in an exception in certain situations #83634
  • .net7 wpf win7 64 use large memory #83628
  • CA2007 for Durable function Orchestrations #78371
  • Error 1067 during windows service stop #81274
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce the size of some Http header values #83640
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Remove unused code for PBKDF2 on Android #83639
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Unroll Span.CopyTo for constant input #83638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] partial reversal of PR #82826 #83637
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix porting from servicing release #83633
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement support for unspeakable types. #83631
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Boost hit count for outer back branch targets; improve conditional execution detection #83630
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

Merged

  • [Mono] Intrinsify As* on ARM64 with mini JIT #83544
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve and enable writing test wrappers to disk #83444
    test-enhancement
  • Include args in hostfxr entry point tracing #83605
    area-Host
  • [android][ios] Add SDK and workload to support library mode #83487
    area-Build-mono
  • Use Environment.SystemDirectory from GetFolderPath(System) on Windows #83593
  • Use unsigned division for IndexOf result calculations #83612
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update xarch to track more instruction metadata as flags #83473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] experiment - Ignore PHI nodes for `IfConversion` phase #83625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Correct formatting of config binder generator #83614
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: stop copying EH tab info into inlinee compiler #83622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: revise inlinee block numbering, enable synthesis for inlinees #83610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge binary perf with big endian #83561
    area-Serialization
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix ToString handling of [Flags] enums with negative values #83616
  • Improve RA for LowerBlockStore #83627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use ROSpan in SslStreamCertificateContext #83485
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83510
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter monitoring phase take 2 #83489
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement basic debug info support for types and variables #2229
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix warnings and use LLVM helpers for EH dispatchers #2226
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement inline delegate invoke #2225
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement support for lazy virtual tables #2224
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement `ldvirtftn` support #2223
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Spill GC temps live across safe points #2222
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass structs by reference in accordance with the WASM C ABI #2220
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge oct 22 #2219
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • when i install dotnet 8 preview maui dotnet 6 disappear #31296
  • Build failed after upgrade to .Net 8.0 Preview 2.23153.2 and Visual Studio 2022 Professional 17.5.2 #31295

PullRequests

Created

    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Files not ending in css are probably not css files #23086
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Generated IL for `&local` in an `async` method in debug contains a GC hole #63100
    17.6

Updated

  • Record inheritdoc shows in quick info but still get CS1573 #67326

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals natural type #67364

Updated

  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Improve props in readonly struct #67360
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67355
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef #47296
  • QuickGrid responsive table support #47294
  • Add an option to disable DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware with WebApplication / Minimal APIs #47293
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #47292
  • Web Socket Always in Closed State #47289

Closed

  • System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute in UseEndpoints. #46758
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #47284
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plainTextEmptyFilter #47291
  • Refer `ActionResult` and `ActionResult<T>` from Blazor WebAssemly projects #47252
  • Unable to load test appsettings in integration tests #40681
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert AspNetCoreAnalyzers strings to localizable strings #47295
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Revised aspnetcorev2_outofprocess library loading for ARM64X pure forwarder #47290
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add TypedResults.Extentensions #47285
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView not working properly in MacCatalyst #14046
  • MAUI Blazor. Publish iOS. Can not create an IOS archive. Code object is not signed at all. In subcomponent. SQLLitePCLRaw.lib.e_sqllite.ios.aotdata.arm64 #14044
  • [iOS] After lower positioned text entry item selected and scrolled, you can't scroll back to it. #14043
  • [iOS] Page Contents shift down when using Prompt with input field. #14041

Closed

  • .NET 8 Feature Request: Support Blazor Hybrid on Linux/Ubuntu #11738
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI App is there any tool from Microsoft which supports MAUI GUI Automation? #11650
    Backlog
  • Blazor Maui : "<audio />" tag doesn't show screen lock notification on Android #11675
  • Infrared sensor #11322
    Backlog
  • Publish Maui app as exe not work on window 10 - continue #11254
  • Add interface for Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.MainThread #11054
    Backlog
  • Checklist for win-arm64 support #11090
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • TextCell isVisible #11120
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Maps custom object in map Pin #9909
    Backlog
  • MAUI equivalent to Xamarin.Azure.NotificationHubs.iOS for iOS push notifications #10330
    Backlog
  • MAUI 17.4pr1, Markup extension cause debugger fail to attach #10081
    Backlog
  • Control Templates do not have a way to access elements in Control Templates #9817
    Backlog
  • OpenGLView is not available #9623
    Backlog
  • Reusable / extendable version of SecureStorage? (and for that matter - other relevant packages as well) #9276
    Backlog
  • Add iOS native library #8679
  • Android Picker (Theme Change BackgroundColor wont Update) Bug #8437
  • ToPlatformException in MauiCustomRenderer sample app #7999
  • VS does not always show compile time errors of MAUI app #7061
  • Tried to get a simple expander view to work. Works fine on Android but not on Windows #6632
    Backlog
  • Add license headers to source files. #5978
  • Failure to initialize App MainPage on startup after updating to RC1 #6063
    Backlog
  • Add an overloaded constructor for the requested types to simplify things #4831
    Backlog
  • Unable to use ONNX: Reference to type 'ReadOnlySpan<>' claims it is defined in 'mscorlib', but it could not be found #5078
    Backlog
  • Views Don't Support RightToLeft Layout #4245
    Backlog
  • ProgressBar, add three fields #3890
    Backlog
  • MAUI template does not available on visual studio 2022 for mac #14017

PullRequests

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14040
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Update extensions versions #14010
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • [vs-workload] Remove @(MultiTargetPackNames) #14031

Updated

  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
  • Bump WASDK and BuildTools #13687
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
